Hands down, One of the best meals I've ever had!Tasting menu with the wine pairing is the way to go Family run, all so  in tune with service& food. The wine was all local and from small lotsComing from the Bay Area - Napa, we could not have had a more amazing  meal --  especially for our wedding anniversary !If in the area swing by, talk to the owner & make a reservation - they fill up fast!
